data.name: ScudBuster
data.detailed_description: This game is a full 3d in your face missile shooter game. We took an old arcade missile game and mixed it with strategy elements and created a wild missile shooter that will keep you on the edge of your seat.You set up your battlefield with 6 units consisting of 3 Surface to Surface missile launchers, 1 Surface to Air missile launcher, a radar system and a command bunker. When both sides are ready you fire missiles at each other until all 3 SSM's are dead or you lose the command bunker.
data.about_the_game: This game is a full 3d in your face missile shooter game. We took an old arcade missile game and mixed it with strategy elements and created a wild missile shooter that will keep you on the edge of your seat.You set up your battlefield with 6 units consisting of 3 Surface to Surface missile launchers, 1 Surface to Air missile launcher, a radar system and a command bunker. When both sides are ready you fire missiles at each other until all 3 SSM's are dead or you lose the command bunker.
data.short_description: Missile Command style shooter game with Battleship strategy elements

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel, AMD
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea 240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Xaudio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel, AMD
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidea 240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
